text: Swapna Halliyil Orunaal is a 2002 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Gopalji, starring Krishna Kumar and Narendra Prasad in the lead role. http://www.filmibeat.com/malayalam/movies/swapnahalliyil-orunaal/cast- crew.html ==Cast== * Krishna Kumar (KK) * Bindu Krishna * Hrishi * Mala Aravindan * Narendra Prasad * Priyadarsini * Ravi Menon * Girija (New) ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Swapna Halliyil Orunaal
